Class Description
AbstractAnimation
Animation provides the basic functionality to run an animation.
AffineTransformDemo
This class demonstrates how shapes can be rotated and translated.
AnimatedObject
An object that changes during animation.
AnimatedObjectDemo
A demo of what an animated object might look like.
AnimatedObjectDemo2
A demo of what an animated object might look like.
AnimationDemo
This class provides a simple demonstration of how you would implement an animation (or game!) that contains multiple animated objects.
AnimationDemo2
This class provides a simple demonstration of how you would implement an animation (or game!) that contains multiple animated objects.
AnimationStub  
Doctor
Doctor class would create a doctor object that will be controlled by the player.
MasklessPeople
MasklessPeoeple would be able to create a MasklessPerson and make it randomly enter the screen and shoot five germs to the player.
MouseInput  
OnscreenObject  
PandemicGame
Creates a PandemicGame.
PandemicGame.STATE
Keeps track of the state of the game
Particles
This class implements Particles class and defines methods to allow particles to move in the direction of the doctor object and disappear when they get in contact with viruses or maskless people.
particleSpreader  
Virus
This class creates the virus class with methods to allow it to move, split, change point values and wrap around the screen properly
